commit message: Preparing for version 0.5
Updated build.xml
Added copyright lines
Added support for pulling a contact's name and displaying it in RemoteRingActivity
Replaced Build.VERSION.SDK with Build.VERSION.SDK_INT
Made an API level check in PreferencesActivity consistent and removed an extra space

Refactored message handling code out of SmsReceiver into the new class MessageHandler

This change was made to prepare for the addition of more triggers.
Fixed the line endings and added copyright/GPL header in MessageHandler
Removed outdated code
Added 'RDD' as a shortcut for 'RingyDingyDingy' in commands
Added the ability to disable the SMS trigger

Changed MessageHandler.processMessage to accept String instead of ArrayList

This change was made to simplify the triggers.
Added a trigger for Google Voice
Replaced 'phone' with 'device' and 'text' with 'send' where applicable
Renamed MainActivity's strings and changed some of them
Changed preferences_remote_lock_warning to match the error message
Updated the manifest to disable the requirement for telephony hardware
Disabled the Google Voice trigger preference if Google Voice is not installed
Made preferences_remote_lock_needs_froyo more terse
Version 0.5
